products.food1_desc: Heura marinated in a wheat tortilla with pickled cabbage, lettuce, cucumber, onion, and chili. With our organic soy yogurt sauce and spicy sauce.
products.food2_desc: Heura marinated in a pita bread with pickled cabbage, lettuce, cucumber, onion, and chili. With our organic soy yogurt sauce and spicy sauce.
products.food3_desc: Seitan marinated in a pita bread with pickled cabbage, lettuce, cucumber, onion, and chili. With our organic soy yogurt sauce and spicy sauce.
products.food4_desc: Seitan marinated in a wheat tortilla with pickled cabbage, lettuce, cucumber, onion, and chili. With our organic soy yogurt sauce and spicy sauce.

about.ab_desc:
Kebab Amego, where authentic Turkish cuisine meets accessibility. 

We are committed to providing delicious dishes at affordable prices, believing that everyone deserves to enjoy a quality dining experience without overspending. 

Discover the fusion of authentic flavors and a welcoming atmosphere in our Turkish corner, where customer satisfaction is our priority. 

Join us to create unforgettable culinary moments!
